title: Lightning Jabber
content:
1.35 65

Lightning Jabber

Versatile - Wielding With Both Hands

1d8 (1d6)+1 Piercing+1d4 Lightning

Shocking Sting: On a hit, possibly Shock your target.

Throwing: Lightning Damage: When launched at a target, deal an additional 1-4 Lightning damage.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

A makeshift spear fashioned from a giant crab's claw and the charged imagination of kua-toa fishfolk.

Spear Thrown Versatile

Lightning Jabber is one of the Spear Weapons in Baldu
